description: These aromatic prawn skewers make a quick and easy starter or light lunch.
name: Coconut Chilli Prawn Skewers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak 8 skewers in cold water. Place the prawns in a shallow dish. Mix the coconut milk, lemongrass paste, fish sauce, lime juice and zest, coriander stalks, honey and red chilli together and pour over the prawns. Cover and set aside for 1 hour.

Heat the BBQ to the highest setting. Thread the prawns onto the skewers and brush with marinade. Grill for 2 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Serve with fresh chopped coriander and coconut flakes scattered on top.
